function.name: washingContaminationLevel_decrease
function.description: This function is used to decrease the contamination level of a washing machine.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to decrease the contamination level.

predefinedCompartment.description: The predefined compartment to decrease the contamination level.

washingContaminationLevelDelta.description: The delta value to decrease the contamination level.
